job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Coders Connect is excited to partner with a leading global player in customer experience solutions based in the Netherlands. Specializing in providing tech-driven customer support for some of the world's top brands, they focus on leveraging data and AI to enhance user interactions across various industries.
   As a Senior Data Engineer, you will help expand and mature their cloud platform, playing a critical role in developing and maintaining data architecture and pipelines within a cutting-edge technology environment, heavily focused on Azure services., * Data Integration and Architecture: Design and manage cloud integrations within Azure, ensuring seamless data flow between systems and platforms.
     * ETL and Data Pipelines: Develop and manage ETL processes to support data products and analytics solutions, ensuring optimized performance.
     * Azure Expertise: Leverage Azure services like Data Factory, Databricks, and Azure Synapse to implement scalable data workflows and solutions.
     * Machine Learning & AI Support: Collaborate with data scientists and machine learning teams to ensure efficient data access and integration.
     * Collaboration with Microsoft: Partner with Microsoft on innovative projects, leveraging the latest in cloud technology and generative AI to drive progress.
job_details.full_text:
Data Engineer

Coders Connect is excited to partner with a leading global player in customer experience solutions based in the Netherlands. Specializing in providing tech-driven customer support for some of the world's top brands, they focus on leveraging data and AI to enhance user interactions across various industries.
   As a Senior Data Engineer, you will help expand and mature their cloud platform, playing a critical role in developing and maintaining data architecture and pipelines within a cutting-edge technology environment, heavily focused on Azure services., * Data Integration and Architecture: Design and manage cloud integrations within Azure, ensuring seamless data flow between systems and platforms.
     * ETL and Data Pipelines: Develop and manage ETL processes to support data products and analytics solutions, ensuring optimized performance.
     * Azure Expertise: Leverage Azure services like Data Factory, Databricks, and Azure Synapse to implement scalable data workflows and solutions.
     * Machine Learning & AI Support: Collaborate with data scientists and machine learning teams to ensure efficient data access and integration.
     * Collaboration with Microsoft: Partner with Microsoft on innovative projects, leveraging the latest in cloud technology and generative AI to drive progress.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional data engineering tasks within an Azure environment, with only a tangential mention of AI/ML support. It lacks the core responsibilities and technologies associated with either an ML Engineer or a GenAI Engineer.

job_tasks.phrase: Design and manage cloud integrations within Azure, ensuring seamless data flow between systems and platforms.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the process of building and maintaining data infrastructure and pipelines, which falls under Data Engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and manage ETL processes to support data products and analytics solutions, ensuring optimized performance.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions the development and management of ETL processes, a core component of Data Engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Leverage Azure services like Data Factory, Databricks, and Azure Synapse to implement scalable data workflows and solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the implementation of data workflows and solutions using specific cloud services, aligning with Data Engineering and Operations Engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with data scientists and machine learning teams to ensure efficient data access and integration.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a supporting role for ML/AI teams, focusing on data provision rather than direct model development or GenAI application building.

job_tasks.phrase: Partner with Microsoft on innovative projects, leveraging the latest in cloud technology and generative AI to drive progress.
job_tasks.justification: While mentioning generative AI, the context is about leveraging it as part of broader cloud technology projects, not the core development of GenAI applications.
